text: both NOx and PM. The current standards are Stage IV for construction machinery operating in the Central Activities Zone and Opportunity Areas (including Canary Wharf) and Stage IIIB in the rest of London. Stage IV standards will apply throughout London from 1st January 2025, and Stage V from 2030. Prior to commencement of works, all NRMM must be registered on the [NRMM register, which can be accessed at www.london.gov.uk/what-](https://www.london.gov.uk/what-we-do/environment/pollution-and-air-quality/nrmm) [we-do/environment/pollution-and-air-quality/nrmm. A number of](https://www.london.gov.uk/what-we-do/environment/pollution-and-air-quality/nrmm) exemptions also apply to individual pieces of equipment.
